results.title: Dory Power to Showcase Advanced Solar Generators at Consumer ...
results.content: CLEVELAND, OH / ACCESSWIRE / September 1, 2023 / Dory Power, a leading US technology company specializing in portable power solutions, is excited to announce its participation in the upcoming Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas, scheduled to take place from January 9th to 12th, 2024.
results.raw_content:
Dory Power to Showcase Advanced Solar Generators at Consumer Electronics Show 2024
Friday, 01 September 2023 11:00
Dory Power
Innovative technologies meet portability, reliability and uninterruptibility
CLEVELAND, OH / ACCESSWIRE / September 1, 2023 / Dory Power, a leading US technology company specializing in portable power solutions, is excited to announce its participation in the upcoming Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas, scheduled to take place from January 9th to 12th, 2024. CES, organized by the Consumer Technology Association, stands as the premier global event for technology enthusiasts and industry leaders alike.
Recognized for its groundbreaking portable power solutions, Dory Power will leverage CES 2024 as a platform to unveil their latest innovations in solar technology. Attendees can look forward to experiencing firsthand the company's advanced 3-in-1 systems, which seamlessly integrate solar generators, portable power stations, and uninterruptible power supply capabilities.
With CES being the most influential tech event worldwide, Dory Power's participation is a testament to their standing as an industry leader. Attendees can anticipate an immersive experience at the Dory Power booth, where they will have the opportunity to explore the company's latest offerings, engage with product experts, and witness firsthand the capabilities of these cutting-edge solar generators.
Dory Power extends an open invitation to all interested parties, including partners and clients, to join them at CES 2024. This event provides a unique chance to witness the convergence of technology and innovation, all under one roof. Attendees can expect to gain insights into how Dory Power's products can empower a wide range of applications, from indoor backup to outdoor adventures.
For those looking to connect with Dory Power during the event or schedule a dedicated demonstration, representatives will be available at the Dory Power booth throughout the duration of CES 2024. Additional details about the booth location and scheduling opportunities will be made available closer to the event date.
About Dory Power:
Dory Power, founded in 2017 in Cleveland, Ohio, is a leading US technology company focusing on the design and manufacture of advanced lithium-ion battery power systems for energy storage and backup power supply. Dory Power develops and manufactures a range of innovative solar generators and uninterruptible power supply systems, being used by households, hospitals, labs, data centers, law firms, restaurants, and universities nationwide in the United States. The company's mission is to empower people with the freedom to access clean and efficient energy wherever and whenever they need it. Through continuous innovation and a customer-centric approach, Dory Power is shaping the future of portable power solutions.
Contact Information
Dory Power Company Solar generator manufacturer [email protected] 2163863953
SOURCE: Dory Power company

WHAT WE OFFER
Our Full-Service Solutions
We offer power solutions of all sizes – from portable to industrial we are your one-stop-shop!
Portable Battery Generators
Best in class portable battery power stations. Solar rechargeable, expandable and long-lasting to fit your mobile power needs.
Stationary Battery Generators
Stationary battery generators with 3-20 kW rated power and 10-100 kWh capacity, with uninterruptible power supply. Customized systems available.
Large Battery Systems
Large battery storage system with 1-20 MW power output and 10-100 MWh capacity, for solar/grid connection. Customized systems available..

 Solar generators and power stations take over CES 2024

9, Products like the EcoFlow DELTA Pro Ultra, which can run on a variety of fuel sources from gas to solar, possess enough energy to keep your whole house running for extended periods of time.

results.raw_content:
Solar generators and power stations take over CES 2024
Keep your home powered on with a smaller carbon footprint
Updated January
9, 2024
Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases made through the links below may earn us and our publishing partners a commission.
At CES 2024, generators are taking center stage. With extreme weather events becoming more common, generators are now considered a household essential to keep the lights on at all times. In due course, the industry is moving toward sustainable energy options to power them.
Enroll in Home Ec.
Enter your email:
Thanks for signing up.
Thank You!
Different varieties of back-up generators include standbys, portable generators, inverters, and power stations. Among these different designs, there’s a push to run them on eco-friendly fuel, like solar power, rather than gas. At this year’s CES, we’ve seen an abundance of generators and power stations that reduce carbon emissions using solar panels.
This year's CES shows a desire for eco-friendly and innovative generators.
The generators on display at CES are certainly not lacking in power despite their non-traditional fuel sources. Products like the EcoFlow DELTA Pro Ultra, which can run on a variety of fuel sources from gas to solar, possess enough energy to keep your whole house running for extended periods of time.
Solar is cheaper and safer to use than gas, making it a more enticing option. Generators running on solar power are also an appealing choice for folks looking to go off-grid.
In addition to EcoFlow’s powerful generator, we’re seeing products from Jackery and Runhood that continue to push the field of solar-powered generators forward. Jackery makes everything from small but mighty power stations to large generators that come equipped with built-in solar panels.
Runhood’s products offer the flexibility of batteries that can be swapped out and recharged, or solar panels that can be connected directly to its power stations to keep it powered on.
This trend in generators, as seen at CES 2024, signals a broader push toward consumer interest in generators and greener fuel sources.
